Package edu.ie3.datamodel.io.connectors

Class CsvFileConnector

java.lang.Object
edu.ie3.datamodel.io.connectors.CsvFileConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataConnector
public class CsvFileConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataConnector
Provides the connector (here: buffered writer) for specific files to be used by a CsvFileSink
Since:
19.03.20

    • initReader

      public java.io.BufferedReader initReader​(java.lang.Class<? extends UniqueEntity> clz) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Initializes a file reader for the given class that should be read in. The expected file name is determined based on FileNamingStrategy of the this CsvFileConnector instance
      Parameters:
      clz - the class of the entity that should be read
      Returns:
      the reader that contains information about the file to be read in
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the matching file cannot be found

    • initReader

      public java.io.BufferedReader initReader​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Initializes a file reader for the given file name. Use initReader(Class) for files that actually correspond to concrete entities.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file that should be read
      Returns:
      the reader that contains information about the file to be read in
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
